articles.title: Important Anniversaries in DPRK Marked in Foreign Countries
Three Generals of Mt. Paektu Honored on Occasion of Anniv. of Liberation of Korea
articles.content:
Important Anniversaries in DPRK Marked in Foreign Countries 
    Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 8th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 60th birthday of the WPK.
 Round-table talks, meetings, reading sessions, film shows, photo exhibitions and art performances were held in Kinshasa of Democratic Congo, Mexico City of Mexico and Malabo of Equatorial Guinea and by the Universal Tourist Company of Singapore on Sept. 22 and 23.    
 On display in the venues of functions were photos introducing the undying Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and the proud 60 year-long history of the WPK.
 Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, and other speakers at the round-table talks highly praised the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in building the WPK and the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il who has developed the WPK into the eternal party of the President.    
 Benigno Gonzales Villasana, chairman of the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, said at a meeting that the history of the WPK is a history of Kim Il Sung's dedication to the people and a history of creation and changes. The Party has dynamically led the Korean people's struggle to defend the national sovereignty and dignity and the happiness of the people and reunify the country under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
 The president of Singapore's Universal Tourist Company said at a film show that the WPK under the wise leadership of  Kim Jong Il, who steers the history of world politics in the 21st century with his Songun policy, is the most powerful party in the world. 
 Participations of the film shows watched such Korean films as "The Great Leader Successfully Guiding the Building of a Great Prosperous Powerful Nation", "Kim Il Sung Prize Laureate, Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance 'Arirang'", "The 55th Birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "Military Parade and Mass Demonstration Celebrating the 55th Birthday of the Glorious Workers' Party of Korea".
 A reading session on "The First Party Organization--the Society for Rallying Comrades" from Vol. 2 of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", reminiscences of Kim Il Sung, was held at the Korea Chilbo Timber Company of Equatorial Guinea.

articles.title: Raul Castro on Cuba-DPRK Relations
U.S. Urged to Implement Joint Statement
articles.content:
Raul Castro on Cuba-DPRK Relations

Stronger National Unity Called for
Fidel Castro Ruz on Importance of Cooperation between Cuba and DPRK
articles.content:
Stronger National Unity Called for 
    Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation should put further spurs to the struggle to strengthen the great national unity under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" in order to more dynamically push forward the cause of national reunification on the basis of the present stirring reality and elated enthusiasm.
 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article. It goes on: 
 The issue of Korea's reunification is, in essence, the issue of rejoining the blood ties of the Korean nation divided into the north and the south and achieving the national unity. This naturally requires great national unity.    
 No force on earth can keep the Korean nation permanently divided into two as it has been solidly united throughout its ancient history since its appearance. The reunion of the Korean nation as a homogeneous one is an inevitable trend of the national history and the law of national development for the homogenous Korean nation to become one.
 It is the invariable stand and consistent policy of the Workers' Party of Korea to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea through the great national unity.    
 The line and policy of the WPK for great national unity are a brilliant inheritance and embodiment of President Kim Il Sung's idea of great national unity.
 The WPK has fully embodied and successfully carried forward the Juche-oriented idea of great national unity for the victory of which the President worked heart and soul all his life. This consistent line and policy of the WPK for great national unity deeply moved all the fellow countrymen and thus brought about such great national events of historic significance as providing the historic Pyongyang summit and giving birth to the June 15 era of reunification.    
 The great national unity at present should be achieved in the idea of "By our nation itself" under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
 The June 15 joint declaration is a declaration for national independence and great national unity as it embodies the idea of "By our nation itself". Thanks to the June 15 joint declaration, a landmark of national reunification in the 21st century, the Korean nation has been able to more vigorously promote the cause of great national unity.
 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should wage a vigorous patriotic struggle for great national unity to accomplish the cause of national reunification, the greatest desire of the Korean nation, as early as possible through their concerted efforts as required by the stirring realty in the June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: Joint Rally Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fidel Castro Ruz on Importance of Cooperation between Cuba and DPRK 
    Havana, September 27 (KCNA) -- Fidel Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, met and had a friendly conversation with the visiting DPRK delegation headed by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, at the Palace of Conference in Havana on September 27.
 Noting that the DPRK is a brave, resolute and strong country and the Korean people are industrious and disciplined, Fidel Castro Ruz congratulated the DPRK on its success at the recent six-party talks.    
 He laid stress on the importance of support and mutual cooperation between the two countries in the political, economic and other fields.

articles.title: U.S. Interference Concerning Withdrawal of Statue of MacArthur in S. Korea under Fire
Reception Given on Occasion of PRC Anniversary
Greetings to President of Botswana
articles.content:
Reception Given on Occasion of PRC Anniversary
    Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association hosted a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Wednesday evening on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the foundation of the People's Republic of China.
 Present on invitation were members of the Chinese embassy here.
 Addressing the reception, Acting Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Mun Jae Chol said that the Chinese people had waged the protracted and fierce struggle for the independence of the country under the leadership of the Communist Party of China and proclaimed the foundation of the republic at last on Oct. 1, 1949.    
 Since its foundation the Chinese people met all challenges of history and pulled through all difficulties as genuine masters of the state and society and thus built new socialist China in their land with their devoted efforts, he said, and continued:
 The Chinese people are now waging a vigorous struggle to build a comprehensively well-off society by 2020 in accordance with the decision of the 16th Congress of the Communist Party of China, recording signal progress in political, economic, cultural and other fields of society and the international position of China is daily increasing.
 The traditional DPRK-China friendship has steadily consolidated under the deep concern of leader Kim Jong Il and President Hu Jintao in the new century, he said, expressing the belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would as ever grow stronger in conformity with the common desire and interests of the two peoples in the spirit agreed upon by the supreme leaders of both countries.
 Speaking at the reception, Chinese Ambassador Wu Donghe said that the Chinese people are waging a vigorous struggle to attain the strategic goal of building a harmonious society and building a comprehensively well-off society, rallied firm around the Central Committee of the Party with Hu Jintao as general secretary.
 The Korean people grandly celebrated the 60th anniversary of the liberation of Korea and the 57th birthday of the DPRK, thus demonstrating to the world the spiritual trait of the Korean army and people who are out in building a great prosperous powerful country, forming a harmonious whole, single-mindedly united under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il as secretary general, he said. 
 It is a firm strategic policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily develop the friendly and cooperative relations between China and Korea, he pointed out, expressing the determination to work hard together with Korean comrades to keep the tree of bilateral friendship ever green as intended by the leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Finnish Ambassador
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Botswana
    Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Festus G. Mogae, president of Botswana, on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of its independence.
 The message expressed conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests of the two peoples and sincerely wished the president greater success in his work for well-being of the Botswanan people and the development of the country.

articles.title: Chinese Government Delegation to Visit DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Finnish Ambassador
    Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday met and conversed with Finnish Ambassador to the DPRK Benjamin Bassin, who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
 On hand were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and a staff member of the Finnish embassy.
